TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Kawabata, title = Kawabata, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kawabata} }

S.FORM: Kawabata Itiniay i Wufeng Cen no Hsinchu ko Kawabata a niyaro', 54 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 174 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 94% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 164 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 6% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 10 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal 91%, Amis 1%, Paiwan 1%, Saysiyat 2%.

Kawabata Itiniay i Wofeng Cen no Hsincho ko Kawabata a niyaro', 54 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 174 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 94% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 164 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 6% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 10 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal 91%, Amis 1%, Paiwan 1%, Saysiyat 2%.
